Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.group.GroupOptions

  • Packages that use GroupOptions 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.group  

    • Uses of GroupOptions in com.stormpath.sdk.group

      Subinterfaces of GroupOptions in com.stormpath.sdk.group 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  GroupCriteria
      An Group-specific Criteria class, enabling a Group-specific fluentquery DSL.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.group that return GroupOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GroupOptions CreateGroupRequest.getGroupOptions()
      Returns the GroupOptions to be used in the CreateGroupRequest s to retrieve the group's references as part of Stormpath's response upon successful group creation.
      static GroupOptions<GroupOptions> Groups.options()
      Returns a new GroupOptions instance, used to customize how one or more Groups are retrieved.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.group that return types with arguments of type GroupOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GroupOptions<GroupOptions> Groups.options()
      Returns a new GroupOptions instance, used to customize how one or more Groups are retrieved.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.group with parameters of type GroupOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Group Group.saveWithResponseOptions(GroupOptions responseOptions)
      Saves this Group resource and ensures the returned Group response reflects the specified options.
      CreateGroupRequestBuilder CreateGroupRequestBuilder.withResponseOptions(GroupOptions options)
      Ensures that after a Group is created, the creation response is retrieved with the specified group's options.
